title: API: Approve tick
description:
POST /api/ticks/:id/approve endpoint:
- Calls tick.ProcessVerdict with approved
- Returns updated tick JSON
- Validates tick is awaiting human
acceptance_criteria:
- POST /api/ticks/:id/approve returns updated tick
- Tick status becomes closed (for terminal awaiting)
- Verdict field set to 'approved'
- 400 if tick not awaiting human
- 404 for unknown ID
